function.description:
Temporarily store a decorator definition in the UDM cache.
This construct will not push and persist the definition this can be done using the ContentType.save construct. Every field inside the decorator must contain 3 values: the name, the type and the optionality. In the examples below you can see how to build up these decorators.
Supported decorator types: BOOLEAN, STRING, NUMBER, DATE, LIST
